name: end_of_weather
prompt: Global climate control technology has made weather obsolete. Now people start to miss storms, snow, and unpredictability. Write a short broadcast from a group demanding the return of rain.
decoded: We are the people of the world. We demand the return of rain. We demand the return of snow. We demand the return of unpredictability. We demand the return of storms. We demand the return of wind. We demand the return of hail. We demand the return of lightning. We demand weather.
